attributes.action: allow the Secretary of State for Communities and Local Government to refuse the appeal against the development of the proposed cinema Ccomplex, in Brentwood, Essex
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, believe that the proposed plans that Brentwood Council has passed, recently, should go ahead, and that the cinema and its associated shopping mall should be built.   We also believe it will bring much needed jobs and entertainment to our home town.
